head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ARGUIMBAU, VINCENT CHARLES

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ARGUIMBAU, VINCENT CHARLES

block.p: ARGUIMBAU-Vincent Charles, Jr., 84, of Darien, CT. & Seville, Spain died Friday, May 19th in Bangor, Maine. Head of Arguimbau & Co, a professional artist, Trustee of Hispanic Society of America in NYC. Survived by wife of 51 yrs, Carmen Perez de Guzman; children, Vincent, Peter, Mariette & Suzanne; sisters Suzanne Davis & Mariette Badger, 7 grandchildren. Memorial Service 3:30 Wednesday, May 31, St. John's, Darien. In lieu of flowers, contributions to Eastern ME Medical Center, 489 State St, Bangor, ME 04401: or Post 53, Darien, CT. 06820.
